body_html: Well, I'm not sure because you didn't provide a larger code snippet but you did say that there are multiple processes and it's unclear how you are calling it. It certainly isn't the common use case to have multiple threads mutating the graph concurrently. @mrry could you comment on what if any guarantees there are for thread safety?

body: Well, I'm not sure because you didn't provide a larger code snippet but you did say that there are multiple processes and it's unclear how you are calling it. It certainly isn't the common use case to have multiple threads mutating the graph concurrently. @mrry could you comment on what if any guarantees there are for thread safety?
